headline: Comcast Growth Steps Will Take 'A Minimum Of Several Quarters' To Generate Returns: Analyst
summary: BofA Securities analyst Jessica Reif Ehrlich maintained a Neutral rating on Comcast Corp (NASDAQ:CMCSA) with a price forecast of $38 on Thursday. Comcast remains focused on its six growth pillars, and Theme Parks represent an area that will generate strong near-term growth while also offering significant longer-term opportunities. Universal plans to expand existing destinations, bring Universal to new domestic markets with new concepts, and grow its global footprint. Also Read: Comcast Faces Ana

headline: Warner Bros Discovery stock leaps on continued speculation of company split
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery shares jumped as much as 6% early Thursday following comments from CNBC’s David Faber, who reported the company may be exploring a potential breakup.
